OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD ROYAL SOCIETY FOR THE BLIND - SWIMMING GROUP

Desc.entry: Informal swimming session open to anyone with a visual impairment and their carers. Volunteers welcome.

ProvisionPlace.entry: Sheffield Royal Society for the Blind

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Thurs 11.30am-1.30pm (meet inside for collection by mini-bus, which will then transport the group to Upperthorpe swimming baths. The group is then collected at 1.30pm and returns to Mappin Street where an optional social follows)
